io.sarl.maven.docs.testing

Class ReflectExtensions

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sarl.maven.docs.testing.ReflectExtensions

  • public final class ReflectExtensions
extends Object
    Functions that are based on Java reflection, for building the documentation.
    Since:
    0.7
    Version:
    io.sarl.maven.docs.testing 0.12.0 20210527-171007
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.sarl.maven
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.sarl.maven.docs.testing

      • callStaticMethod

        public static def callStaticMethod(type : Class<?>,
                                   methodName : String) : Object 
                            throws NoSuchMethodException,
                                   SecurityException,
                                   IllegalAccessException,
                                   IllegalArgumentException,
                                   InvocationTargetException
        Description copied from class: ReflectExtensions
        Run a method on the given instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - is the object instance.
        methodName - the name of the method.
        Returns:
        the configuration.
        Throws:
        SecurityException - if the method cannot be accessed.
        NoSuchMethodException - is the method is undefined.
        InvocationTargetException - if the method cannot be invoked.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the arguments to the method are invalid.
        IllegalAccessException - if the access to the method is invalid.
        Since:
        0.12
